bug.author: George3d6
bug.description:
Training fails for this file: <denchmark-link:https://www.kaggle.com/russellyates88/suicide-rates-overview-1985-to-2016#master.csv>https://www.kaggle.com/russellyates88/suicide-rates-overview-1985-to-2016#master.csv</denchmark-link>
With error: <denchmark-code> raise ValueError("'%s' is not a valid scope name" % name) ValueError: 'country' is not a valid scope name </denchmark-code>
Spotted when testing issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/issues/182>#182</denchmark-link> , thought the person reporting had no problem with it, it seems.
